barker_notes.barker_summary: Marriage permit— Betsey Bright to Noel Roberts.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 790

div1.p: Marriage permit— Betsey Bright to Noel Roberts.

Be it Known that we David Bright and Judy Bright the Parents of Betsey Bright do hereby agree that our said Daughter may Marry Noel Roberts— witness our hands May 10, 1824 Bracis River, Prove of Texas
for himself and for his wife Judy Bright Attest S. F. Austin Judge
